scripts.build: npm run build-c && npm run build-i
scripts.build-c: GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false rm -rf client-build; mkdir client-build; cd ../client && npm run build && cp -r build/* ../server/client-build/ && cd ../server
scripts.build-i: GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false rm -rf instructor-client-build; mkdir instructor-client-build; cd ../instructor-client && npm run build && cp -r build/* ../server/instructor-client-build/ && cd ../server
